title: Weekend shooting ruled accidental
content:
WICHITA, Kan. - Wichita Police say a weekend shooting is accidental.
It happened in the 1300 block of North Erie around 2:15 Saturday morning. Police arrived on scene and found a 16-year-old girl dead in the basement of the home.
Lt. Jason Stephens says after interviewing witnesses, it appears that a group of teens were playing with a shotgun and the 16-year-old accidentally shot herself. Stephens says it doesn't appear charges will be filed in the case.
